question: What is the population of Viljandi as of the January 2012 estimate?
asked_question_translated: Koliko prebivalcev ima Viljandi po oceni iz januarja 2012?
answer: Po oceni iz januarja 2012 ima Viljandi pribli≈æno 17.500 prebivalcev.
answer_translated_eng: Viljandi has an estimated population of approximately 17 500 inhabitants as of January 2012.
